patthana21.20:1.1: Nahetuṃ nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.20:2.1: Nahetuṃ naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.20:3.1: Nahetuṃ naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
